item.title: How do you appear items?,i still dont understand
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

[quote=“LeScape Pk, post:2, topic:83547”]::pickup ITEMID ITEMAMMOUNT
for a command use this format

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) { addItem(ITEMID, ITEMAMMOUNT); {[/quote]

That is way wrong bud. For one, your indentation is wrong with your second line. Two, your ending bracket is faced the wrong way. What i mean is it should be } not {.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you appear items?,i still dont understand
item.dc:creator: @shortkid shortkid
item.description:
@shortkid wrote:

or type “::item_(item id)”
example, if you want santa hat: “::item 1050”

that will spawn a santa hat under you…

Read full topic

item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok for example do
::pickup 0995 100000
this will get you 100k its not that hard. you just need the right syntax and code. for a list of codes download the moparscape client, go to help, then item ids.
